basic.blooming: Can be planted in all seasons. Fruit period can last two-three months

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients, pH value between 6-7
maintenance.sunlight: Fruits taste great with strong sunlight, sunlight duration time at least 8 hours
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil surface is dry, provide more water during flowering and fruiting period
maintenance.fertilization: Soil with enough compost when planting, increase fertilize time during fruiting period
maintenance.pruning: Thin out seedlings timely and prepare a wooden stick to support their up growing
